title: TikTok Video Upload Workflow
description: Automatically upload video content to TikTok

parameters.description: URL of the video file to upload

blocks.label: navigate_to_tiktok
blocks.title: Navigate to TikTok Upload
blocks.navigation_goal: Go to TikTok creator upload page. If login is required, wait for user to scan QR code.

blocks.label: upload_video
blocks.title: Upload Video File
blocks.navigation_goal: Click on the upload button or drag zone. Upload the video from the provided URL: {{video_url}}

blocks.label: fill_caption
blocks.title: Fill Video Caption

blocks.label: click_post
blocks.title: Click Post Button
blocks.navigation_goal: Wait for video processing, then click 'Post' or 'Publish' button

blocks.label: extract_post_url
blocks.title: Extract Post URL
blocks.navigation_goal: After posting, extract the URL of the published video
blocks.data_extraction_goal: Extract the post URL and post ID if available
